gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 128, Trail Blazers 122
gameRecap.excerpt: Despite Jerami Grants career-high 49 points, the Pistons defeated the Trail Blazers, 128-122, in overtime. Jalen Duren recorded a season-high 27 points, along with a career-high 22 rebounds for the Pistons, while Jaden Ivey (26 points) and Cade Cunningham (23 points) added a combined 49 points in the victory. Jabari Walker tallied 17 points and 11 rebounds for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Pistons improve to 8-43 on the season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 15-36.
